About Us

Welcome to Koordination! We are a smart locator service that helps you easily share your location with others. By simply entering your information, location, and pictures, we generate a personalized QR code that can be scanned to take you directly to your location. Our easy-to-use platform makes sharing your location effortless, whether you need to meet someone in a crowded area or want to provide directions to your home or business. With our reliable and accurate service, you can always be sure that your location is easily accessible to those who need it. Thank you for choosing Koordination as your go-to smart locator solution!
